trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> to and from other types.
The <xref:System.Windows.Expression> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).

For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always return `false`.
<xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always throw an exception.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ExpressionConverter"></xref> class.
Returns whether this converter can convert from a source object to an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
Always `false`.
Returns whether this converter can convert an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to a specific destination type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
Always `false`.
Converts the provided value to the <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
Always throws an exception and returns `null`.
Converts the provided <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to the specified type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
Always throws an exception and returns `null`.
